alert.note: Alert for Palo Duro Canyon; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Randall County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1055 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canyon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Palo Duro Canyon and Timbercreek Canyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
